ISSUE.TITLE: separate own repos and repos of organisations
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: i am in one organisation with about 80 repos and i contribute to 3 of them, so the rest disturbs me, especially when i search for one of my own repos. it should be organized in - own repos - organisation 1 - organisation 2
